forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Drizzle then Partly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 11am. Partly sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 53. West southwest wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the city is greeted by a gentle embrace of morning fog, cloaking the skyline in a serene haze. Underneath this muted ceiling, the possibility of a light drizzle lingers until mid-morning, hinting at the ephemeral beauty of the scene—a gentle reminder of San Francisco's capricious maritime climate. While the sun may contend to filter through, temperatures will remain modest, hovering near sixty degrees and dipping slightly in the afternoon. A light west-southwest breeze whispers through the streets, lending a slight chill to the air, making it an ideal invitation to bundle up just a bit.

Today presents a canvas of contrasts: a blend of soft shadows and potential clarity, shifting as the clouds play their game. With the predicted clearing, one could anticipate a gradual emergence of blue skies later, perfect for a leisurely stroll through the neighborhoods, perhaps stopping by a local café to sip a warm cup of coffee. For those pondering outdoor plans, a light jacket or sweater would be advisable, as the coolness may accompany you even into the evening, when the clouds will blanket the sky once more, settling into a quiet night. Engage in simple pleasures—exploring art galleries or wandering along the waterfront, where the fog will add a touch of mystique to the landmarks—discovering the quiet charm that is uniquely San Francisco.
